Title: The happy news of the Tenth Party Congress travels all over the world, the morning sunlight breaks out over both banks of the Pu River
Designer: Xie Zhiguang (谢之光)Wang Yongqiang (王永强)Xu Zhiwen (徐志文)Xiang Xianwen (项宪文)
Publisher: Renmin meishu chubanshe (人民美术出版社), Beijing
Notes: The 10th National Congress of the CCP was held in the Great Hall of the People, Beijing, between 24-28 August 1973.
Tags: 中国共产党全国代表大会
National Congress of the Chinese Communist Party
